full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer for Maintenance Services

**Title**: W857A-24TR01 Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Trenton

**Reference Number**: WS4334147858-Doc4338026401
**Amendment Number**: 2
**Solicitation Number**: WS4334147858

**Publication Date**: December 4, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: February 2, 2024 14:00 EST
**Amendment Date**: January 9, 2024

**Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

**Procurement Category**: SRV (Services Rendered)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Description

This is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the provision of cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio in Trenton, Ontario (except NCR). The required services include:

* Seeds and bulbs and seedlings and cuttings
* Hardwoods
* Wood flooring
* Vinyl flooring
* Laminate flooring
* Carpet or rug underlays
* Cleaning Equipment and Supplies
* Landscaping services
* Snow removal services
* Carpentry services
* Roofing and siding and sheet metal services

## Instructions to Bidders

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 2, 2024 at 14:00 EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.
* An optional teleconference will be held on December 19th, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in English and also December 20th, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in French. Bidders must confirm attendance by December 15th, 2023 at 14:00 EST.

## Contracting Authority

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact: Martin Gauthier, martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Trade Agreements

* This procurement may be subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

## Notes
